title: The Scottish cavalier;
author: Grant, James
snippet: " Anything but the last," said Lady Bruntisfield. " The Knowes of Cowden hath passed away from the house of Hume, and bonnie though the golden broom may be, it blooms for us no more."

title: Murmurings from rugged waters.
author: Broomfield, James Polwarth. [from old catalog]
snippet: Knowes now crowned wi' buddin' broom, Hawthorns nod their fragrant plume ; Feathered songsters train the wing O' their nestlin's, for 'tis Spring.

title: The works of Robert Burns;
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: Ca" the Exves to the Knowes.

title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: There's Lockie o' the Skirty KnowesThere's Nicol o' Dykeneuk,

title: The complete works of Robert Burns.
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: Ca' the Yowes to the Knowes.
